content: materials to make 1 pair of elbow patches - 1 skein of purl soho s line weight 1 100% merino each skein is 494 yards/ 100 grams approximately 65 98 130 yards required 1 skein will make 7 5 4 pairs - us 4 3 5 mm straight or circular knitting needles 2 - straight pins for securing patch before sewing it on garment - a ball point needle or fine tapestry needle for sewing patches to garment gauge 6 ½ stitches and 12 row = 1 inch in garter stitch with yarn doubled sizes small medium large finished dimensions 3 3½ 4 inches wide by 4½ 5¼ 6 inches long for the yarn used in this project see https //www purlsoho com/line-weight html 1 https //www purlsoho com/line-weight html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html
